name: Free Looney illustrations in PNG
description:
Free Looney illustrations by Icons8

A fusion of classic rubber hose animation with a healthy portion of Nicktoon-style insanity.

Ideal for websites, apps, social media, or marketing.


Want more high-quality, editable, and consistent graphics?


Install our Figma plugin, and thousands of icons, illustrations, and photos will always be at your fingertips.


Also, try our Background remover plugin and cut out images right in Figma. It's free and can handle multiple images at once without losing quality.


All our graphics are free to use if you set a link to Icons8 wherever you use them.

More about linking.


Get more illustrations from this set.
